title: Unknown Error
body: I log in to league and i get this pop up that says unknown error has occurred every time immediately as i log in. After i close the error tab i cant reconnect to the league servers but i can use the client

replies.body: This issue sounds like a network problem failing to connect to the servers.  If you're still experiencing this issue, I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.
